          <title>
            <string language="en">Distribution of crops</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verteilung der Getreide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distribution des collectes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distribuição das colheitas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distribuzione dei raccolti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διανομή των συγκομιδών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Distribución de cosechas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This pie chart shows the percentage of crops harvested and those lost to pests, diseases and weeds.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crops</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">diseases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">growing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">harvest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">harvesting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">PEST</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Weeds</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Kreisdiagramm zeigt den Prozentsatz der 
Getreide, die geerntet werden und der deren verloren zu den Plagen, zu
den Krankheiten und zu den Unkräutern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme circulaire circulaire montre le 
pourcentage des collectes moissonnées et de ceux détruit aux 
parasites, aux maladies et aux mauvaises herbes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta carta de torta mostra a porcentagem das 
colheitas colhidas e daquelas perdida aos pests, às doenças e às 
ervas daninhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma a torta mostra la percentuale 
dei raccolti raccolti e di quelli persa ai parassiti, alle malattie ed
alle erbacce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα πιτών εμφανίζει το ποσοστό των 
συγκομιδών που συγκομίζονται και εκείνοι που χάνονται στα 
παράσιτα, τις ασθένειες και τα ζιζάνια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta carta de empanada muestra el porcentaje de 
las cosechas cosechadas y de ésas perdido a los parásitos, a las 
enfermedades y a las malas hierbas.</string>
          </description>
